Cranston.Crescent Park (defunct amusement park):

=== Ukraine ===

Prypiat amusement park, Prypiat – abandoned after the Chernobyl disaster; the park's Ferris wheel, which is currently standing but not operating, serves as a poignant reminder of the massive human effect of the disaster.
